name: Class BasicTabbedPaneUI.TabbedPaneLayout
text:
This class should be treated as a "protected" inner class.
 Instantiate it only within subclasses of BasicTabbedPaneUI.
codes:
public class BasicTabbedPaneUI.TabbedPaneLayout
extends Object
implements LayoutManager

methods.method_sig:
protected int preferredTabAreaHeight (int tabPlacement,
                                     int width)
methods.description: Returns the preferred tab area height.

methods.method_sig:
protected int preferredTabAreaWidth (int tabPlacement,
                                    int height)
methods.description: Returns the preferred tab area width.

methods.method_sig:
protected void calculateTabRects (int tabPlacement,
                                 int tabCount)

protected void rotateTabRuns (int tabPlacement,
                             int selectedRun)
methods.description: Rotates the run-index array so that the selected run is run[0].

methods.method_sig:
protected void normalizeTabRuns (int tabPlacement,
                                int tabCount,
                                int start,
                                int max)

protected void padTabRun (int tabPlacement,
                         int start,
                         int end,
                         int max)

protected void padSelectedTab (int tabPlacement,
                              int selectedIndex)
